00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_CONTEXTCOUNTACCUMULATOR_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_CONTEXTCOUNTACCUMULATOR_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/ListIteratorNode.hpp"
00059 #include "lemur/lemur-platform.h"
00060 #include "lemur/lemur-compat.hpp"
00061 #include <vector>
00062 #include "indri/EvaluatorNode.hpp"
00063 #include "indri/IndriIndex.hpp"
00064 #include "indri/QuerySpec.hpp"
00065 #include "indri/DocumentCount.hpp"
00066 #include "indri/ListCache.hpp"
00067 
00068 class ContextCountAccumulator : public EvaluatorNode {
00069 private:
00070   // this is a ListIteratorNode that contains extents
00071   // that compose the context of the operation. _contextSize
00072   // is the sum of the lengths of the extents in _context.
00073   ListIteratorNode* _context;
00074 
00075   // this is a ListIteratorNode that emits an extent only for a
00076   // true query match; therefore _occurrences is just a simple count
00077   // the number of extents in _matches.
00078   ListIteratorNode* _matches; 
00079 
00080   std::string _name;
00081   UINT64 _occurrences;
00082   UINT64 _contextSize;
00083 
00084   UINT64 _maximumContextSize;
00085   UINT64 _minimumContextSize;
00086   UINT64 _maximumOccurrences;
00087 
00088   double _maximumContextFraction;
00089 
00090   EvaluatorNode::MResults _results;
00091 
00092   // cache support
00093   ListCache* _listCache;
00094   ListCache::CachedList* _cache;
00095   SimpleCopier _query;
00096 
00097 public:
00098   ContextCountAccumulator( const std::string& name, UINT64 occurrences, UINT64 contextSize );
00099   ContextCountAccumulator( const std::string& name, UINT64 occurrences, UINT64 contextSize, UINT64 maximumOccurrences, UINT64 minimumContextSize, UINT64 maximumContextSize, double maximumContextFraction );
00100   ContextCountAccumulator( const std::string& name, ListCache* listCache, ListCache::CachedList* cache, ListIteratorNode* matches, UINT64 collectionSize, UINT64 maxDocumentLength );
00101   ContextCountAccumulator( const std::string& name, ListCache* listCache, ListCache::CachedList* cache, ListIteratorNode* matches, ListIteratorNode* context );
00102 
00103   ~ContextCountAccumulator();
00104 
00105   UINT64 getOccurrences() const;
00106   UINT64 getContextSize() const;
00107 
00108   const ListIteratorNode* getContextNode() const;
00109   const ListIteratorNode* getMatchesNode() const;
00110   const std::string& getName() const;
00111 
00112   const EvaluatorNode::MResults& getResults();
00113   void evaluate( int documentID, int documentLength );
00114   int nextCandidateDocument();
00115 };
00116 
00117 #endif // INDRI_CONTEXTCOUNTACCUMULATOR_HPP
